title: 1937 Western - The Mysterious Bandit - Tom Tyler Blasts His Way Through An Outlaw Gang

sources.title: 1937 Western - The Mysterious Bandit - Tom Tyler Blasts His Way Through An Outlaw Gang
sources.description:
Tom 'Cheyenne Tommy' Wade, is a lawman who poses as a gang member in an attempt to expose Girard, a fraudulent cattle thief. He steals one thousand dollars from the thief, promising to return it if he can join the gang, while plotting a way to expose them as thieves. As Cheyenne is let into the gang, he begins to blackmail the leader, forcing him to let more law enforcers join the gang, eventually outnumbering them and finally arresting the thieves for good.

Original title: Cheyenne Rides Again (1937) 

Directed by Robert F. Hill

Main cast:
Tom Tyler - Tom 'Cheyenne Tommy' Wade
Lon Chaney Jr. - Girard
Carmen Laroux - Panela
Lucile Browne - Sally Lane
Ed Cassidy - Dave Gleason
Ted Lorch - Rollin
Merrill McCormick - Gang Member
Slim Whitaker - Sheriff Jed Martin
Robert F. Hill - Bartender Ed
Merrill McCormick - Henchman
Jack Smith - Jack
Roger Williams - Henchman Mack

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/5p7q49hblcU

@CultCinemaClassics
